snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg will take much of his City Hall team with him as he creates a consulting group to help him reshape cities around the globe.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg will create high-powered consulting group to help him reshape cities around world by promoting policies he instituted in New York; group will be led by many of the best-known and longest-serving members of his administration, and will act as an urban SWAT team, deployed at the invitation of local governments to solve knotty, long-term challenges.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg will take much of his City Hall team with him as he creates a consulting group to help him reshape cities around the globe.

headline.main: Bloomberg Focuses on Rest (as in Rest of the World)
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Focuses on Rest (as in Rest of World)
